entry.title: The New Best Practices Podcast
entry.summary:
Hey everyone! We recently published the first couple episodes of my podcast The New Best Practices. Long-time friends and collaborators Jason Sich, Jace Browning, and myself discuss the process of creating software.
Our first four episode topics cover:
Code Review Code Comments YAGNI Story Points
We are unlikely to ever have episodes like “What’s new in technology XYZ”, and instead we have upcoming
